Package Description

  • Uses of Person in display

    Methods in display that return types with arguments of type Person 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Person> Tier.getPeople()  
    Methods in display with parameters of type Person 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Tier.addPersonToArrayList​(Person p)  
    void Tier.addPersonToGrid​(Person p)
    Add a person GameComponent into the grid at a specified location in the Person's contructor;
    void Tier.movePerson​(Person p)
    Move a Person from its original location to a new location
    void Tier.removeFromGrid​(Person p)
    Remove a person from the grid only so that you cannot see them, will still count towards the total population

  • Uses of Person in gamecomponents.people

    Subclasses of Person in gamecomponents.people 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Doctor
    The Doctor class represents a Person that is immune to Covid and can be used to create Hospitals.
    class  Player
    The Player class is a Person that is controlled by the user.
    class  Researcher
    A Researcher is an invincible person, who can open up vaccine clinics
    Methods in gamecomponents.people that return Person 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Person Player.getYourPerson()
    Get the person in your inventory
    Methods in gamecomponents.people with parameters of type Person 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Player.dropPerson​(Person p, Tier t)
    Puts the person in a random adjacent spot
    void Player.grabPerson​(Person p, Tier t)
    Picks up a person from the Tier and updates the Inventory

  • Uses of Person in gamecomponents.places

    Methods in gamecomponents.places with parameters of type Person 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean Hospital.addPatient​(Person p)
    Admits a person that is not a Researcher or Player to the Hospital if the Hospital is not at its maximum capacity of 5 people.
    boolean VaccineClinic.addPerson​(Person p)
    Admits a patient to the VaccineClinic, a Person that is not a Doctor, Player, or Researcher can only be admitted if the clinic is not at its full capacity of 5 people.
